definitions.definition: Property abandoned by its former guardian or owner ; ( countable ) an item of such property.

subdefinitions.definition: Property abandoned at sea with no hope of recovery and no expectation of being returned to its owner; ( countable ) an item of such property, especially a ship .

definitions.definition: An abandoned or forsaken person ; an outcast , a waif .
A homeless or jobless person; a vagrant ; also, a person who is ( perceived as) negligent in their hygiene and personal affairs .
A person who is negligent in performing a duty .

main_definition: ( uncountable ) Property abandoned by its former guardian or owner ; ( countable ) an item of such property.
secondary_definitions: ( countable , dated ) An abandoned or forsaken person ; an outcast , a waif .
( countable , by extension , derogatory ) A homeless or jobless person; a vagrant ; also, a person who is ( perceived as) negligent in their hygiene and personal affairs .
( countable , chiefly US ) A person who is negligent in performing a duty .
